00019 class BitstreamData
00020 {
00021 private:
00022         SlidingWindow *_slidingWindow;
00023         FILE *_file;
00024         MVCMasterThreadHandle thread;
00025         uint8_t *fileBuf;
00026         int bufPos;
00027         int bufLen;
00028         static const int FILE_BUF_SIZE = 65536;
00029 
00030         static int BitstreamReader(void *param)
00031         {
00032                 BitstreamData *self = (BitstreamData *)param;
00033                 self->ProcessData();
00034                 return 0;
00035         }
00036 public:
00037         BitstreamData(SlidingWindow *slidingWindow, const char *fileName) : _slidingWindow(slidingWindow), bufPos(0), bufLen(0)
00038         {
00039                 fileBuf = new uint8_t[FILE_BUF_SIZE];
00040                 _file = fopen(fileName, "rb");
00041                 ASSERT(_file);
00042                 thread = MVCCreateMasterThread(BitstreamReader, this);
00043         }
00044 
00045         ~BitstreamData()
00046         {
00047                 MVCWaitMasterThread(thread);
00048                 fclose(_file);
00049                 delete[] fileBuf;
00050         }
00051 
00052         bool LoadNextStream(uint8_t *stream, int &len)
00053         {
00054                 len = 0;
00055                 int t0 = 0;
00056                 bool started = false;
00057                 while (true)
00058                 {
00059                         if (bufPos >= bufLen)
00060                         {
00061                                 if (bufPos>3)
00062                                 {
00063                                         fileBuf[0] = fileBuf[bufPos-3];
00064                                         fileBuf[1] = fileBuf[bufPos-2];
00065                                         fileBuf[2] = fileBuf[bufPos-1];
00066                                 }
00067                                 bufLen = fread(fileBuf+3, 1, FILE_BUF_SIZE-3, _file) + 3;
00068                                 bufPos = 3;
00069                                 if (bufLen <= 3)
00070                                         return started;
00071                         }
00072 
00073                         if (started && t0>=2 && (fileBuf[bufPos]==1))
00074                         {
00075                                 bufPos -= 3;
00076                                 len -= t0;
00077                                 return true;
00078                         }
00079                         if (started && !(t0>=2 && (fileBuf[bufPos]==3)))
00080                         {
00081                                 stream[len++] = fileBuf[bufPos];
00082                         }
00083                         if (t0>=3 && (fileBuf[bufPos]==1))
00084                         {
00085                                 started = true;
00086                         }
00087                         if (!fileBuf[bufPos])
00088                                 ++t0;
00089                         else
00090                                 t0 = 0;
00091                         ++bufPos;
00092                 }
00093         }
00094 
00095         void ProcessData()
00096         {
00097                 SequenceParametersSet &sps = CodecInfo::GetInstance().sps;
00098                 PictureParametersSet &pps = CodecInfo::GetInstance().pps;
00099                 SliceParameters sp;
00100 
00101 
00102                 sp.viewId = 0;
00103                 sps.viewCount = 1;
00104                 sps.viewCodingOrder.clear();
00105                 sps.viewCodingOrder.push_back(0);
00106                 sps.anchorRefsList0.clear();
00107                 ArrayList<int> tmp;
00108                 sps.anchorRefsList0.push_back(tmp);
00109                 sps.anchorRefsList1 = sps.anchorRefsList0;
00110                 sps.nonAnchorRefsList0 = sps.anchorRefsList0;
00111                 sps.nonAnchorRefsList1 = sps.anchorRefsList0;
00112                 ArrayList<int> *ref_frames = 0;
00113 
00114                 uint8_t *buf = new uint8_t[100000];
00115                 int len;
00116                 while (LoadNextStream(buf, len))
00117                 {
00118                         InStream is(buf, len);
00119                         int nalType = is.GetNalType();
00120                         switch (nalType)
00121                         {
00122                         case NAL_UNIT_SPS:
00123                                 is.ReadSequenceParameterSet(sps);
00124                                 break;
00125                         case NAL_UNIT_SUBSET_SPS:
00126                                 is.ReadSubsetSequenceParameterSet(sps);
00127                                 break;
00128                         case NAL_UNIT_PPS:
00129                                 is.ReadPictureParameterSet(pps);
00130                                 break;
00131                         case NAL_UNIT_CODED_SLICE_PREFIX:
00132                                 is.ReadSlicePrefix(sp, sps);
00133                                 break;
00134                         case NAL_UNIT_CODED_SLICE:
00135                         case NAL_UNIT_CODED_SLICE_IDR:
00136                         case NAL_UNIT_CODED_SLICE_SCALABLE:
00137                                 {
00138                                         if (!ref_frames)
00139                                         {
00140                                                 _slidingWindow->Init(sps.width, sps.height, sps.viewCount, sps.numRefFrames, sps.numRefFrames * Configure::GOP_LIMIT + 1);
00141                                                 ref_frames = new ArrayList<int>[sps.viewCount]();
00142                                         }
00143                                         int fu = _slidingWindow->GetFirstUnfinished();
00144                                         sp.IDR = false;
00145                                         int ps = is.ReadSliceHeader(sp, ref_frames, *_slidingWindow, fu);
00146                                         CodingPictInfo *cpi;
00147                                         while (!(cpi = _slidingWindow->GetCodingPictInfo(sp.timeId, sp.viewId)))
00148                                                 Sleep(10);
00149                                         //printf("READ %d, %d\n", sp.timeId, sp.viewId);
00150                                         *_slidingWindow->GetSliceParameters(sp.timeId, sp.viewId) = sp;
00151                                         memcpy(cpi->resultStream, buf + ps/32*4, len-ps/32*4);
00152                                         cpi->streamStart = ps & 31;
00153                                         *cpi->resultSize = len * 8 - ps;
00154                                         cpi->pictStatus |= PICT_STATUS_AVAIL;
00155                                         _slidingWindow->IncreaseAvail();
00156                                         break;
00157                                 }
00158                         default : ;
00159                         }
00160                 }
00161                 _slidingWindow->SetDataFinished();
00162                 delete[] buf;
00163         }
00164 };
